actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to eliminate 1,000 of the positions within the Department of Energy associated with the administration of the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973, effective at the expiration of that Act.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Terminates 1,000 of the positions within the Department of Energy currently allocated to administer the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 by October 1, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate 1,000 of the positions within the Department of Energy associated with the administration of the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973, effective at the expiration of that Act.
